00022 /* standard includes. */
00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <syslog.h>
00025 
00026 #include <netinet/in.h>
00027 
00028 /* my includes. */
00029 #include "program_typedefs.h"
00030 
00031 /* externs. */
00032 extern void log_report (cint, unique, unique);
00033 
00034 /* function prototypes. */
00035 void cleanup_files (void);
00036 
00037 /* functions. */
00038 /* the following function tries to remove
00039    all the files that the program creates. */
00040 void
00041 cleanup_files (void)
00042 {
00043   /* extern necessary elements. */
00044   extern bool remove_file (unique);
00045   extern unique lock_file;
00046 
00047   /* try to remove files. */
00048   if (!remove_file (lock_file))
00049     log_report (LOG_ERR, "remove_file() [cleanup]", lock_file);
00050 
00051   return;
00052 }
